Craig Kirkwood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Craig_Kirkwood 0 Craig Kirkwood (born August 10, 1974) is an American lawyer and former actor. He is best known for his role as Jerry "Rev" Harris in the 2000 film Remember the Titans. Craig_Kirkwood ( born August_10_,_1974 ) is an_American_lawyer and former_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Jerry_"_Rev_"_Harris in the_2000_film Remember the_Titans .
